T02TD2950E:29a-0: @29a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2950E:29a-1: sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas /
T02TD2950E:29a-2: gnas yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas sgom bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs te /
T02TD2950E:29a-3: sa stegs dkyil 'khor gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par byas te thig btab la tshon bkye ste /
T02TD2950E:29a-4: dbus padma 'dab ma bzhi pa ste lte ba ljang gu padma rigs kyi mdog lte ba'i mu khyud nag po rdo rje rab dkar pos bskor ba /
T02TD2950E:29a-5: gong ras dmar po mu khyud ser po sna tshogs padmas mtshan pa /
T02TD2950E:29a-6: sgo bzhi rta babs su yod pa bris la /
T02TD2950E:29a-7: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa lnga la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2950E:29a-8: lha so so'i mtshan ma btab la so so'i gnas su bzhag / sgo bzhir phur bu bzhi la dar le brgan gyi con pan btags la gzugs /
T02TD2950E:29a-9: de yang ras kyi skud pa la rma bya'i mdongs kyis sprel lo //
T02TD2950E:29a-10: p'u dza'i bye brag lnga lnga bsham /
T02TD2950E:29a-11: phyogs skyong ba'i gtor ma'i tshogs legs par bshams la /
T02TD2950E:29a-12: de nas dbus kyi bum pa la rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang gu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2950E:29a-13: de nyid kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas spyan drangs la bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2950E:29a-14: de nas lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang lcags sgrog dang dril bu'i phyag rgya bcings la /
T02TD2950E:29a-15: aom badzra aam ku sha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2950E:29a-16: aom badzra p'a sha sv'a h'a /
T02TD2950E:29a-17: aom badzra spho ta sv'a h'a /
T02TD2950E:29a-18: aom badzra ghande sv'a h'a zhes so so'i bum pa la dmigs te /
T02TD2950E:29a-19: lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu brjod pas shar phyogs kyi bum par padma dang zla ba'i steng du /
T02TD2950E:29a-20: dza: las lha mo mdog dkar mo'i lag na lcags kyu thogs pa zhal bag tsam khro ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2950E:29a-21: skra ser po gyen la brdzes pa /
T02TD2950E:29a-23: lhor h'um las lha mo ser mo rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
T02TD2950E:29b-0: phyag na rdo rje zhags pa rtse gsum pas @29b mtshan pa thogs pa thod pas brgyan pa bskyed do //
T02TD2950E:29b-1: nub tu bam las lha mo dmar mo phyag na lcags sgrog nyi zlas mtshan pa bskyed do //
T02TD2950E:29b-2: byang du ho: las lha mo ljang ser lag na dril bu dkrol ba bskyed la /
T02TD2950E:29b-3: de dag gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du so so'i ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la /
T02TD2950E:29b-4: ye shes sems dpa'i snying gar so so'i sa bon la so so'i sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'i sngags kyi rang sgra la dmigs te /
T02TD2950E:29b-5: bdag nyid kyis khrus byas la bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD2950E:29b-7: aom bi ja ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2950E:29b-8: aom aa dzi te sv'a h'a /
T02TD2950E:29b-9: aom dzv'a la sv'a h'a zhes so so'i bum pa la dmigs te /
T02TD2950E:29b-10: khri phrag re bzlas te stong gis mchod pa 'bul /
T02TD2950E:29b-11: spyan drang ba dang bzhugs su gsol ba dang /
T02TD2950E:29b-12: phyag btsal ba dang bstod pa re bya /
T02TD2950E:29b-13: de ltar bzlas pa byas la lha so so 'od du zhu chu bdud rtsir gyur pa las lha mo grangs med pa 'phros ba las /
T02TD2950E:29b-14: phyi nang gi dbang bdag la bskur bar dmigs la /
T02TD2950E:29b-15: de nas slob ma bskyed pa la sogs pa byas la dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2950E:29b-19: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
T02TD2950E:29b-20: sgo ma bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i cho ga / rin po che dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
